1.content:
It was the end of the school year and many of the teachers and students were preparing for the long holidays before them. As the bell rung to signal the final period of teaching for the year, most students were happily playing and chatting away, but some teachers knew one classes time was up. Sitting at the front of class 3H a young boy was excited he knew he had good grades, he always did. While he was sitting in class the teacher walked up to him and said "Hey Jacob, i would like you to stay behind after school for a bit, we just need to talk". he nodded and sat through the class.

Across the other side of the school there was a different story.There was a class of boys there who were the worst graded and worst performing class in the whole school. They had no idea how doomed they were as they threw books and paper around the room for their final day of school. The teacher walked in and called out "Right boys, you are all going to be part of something special today, so sit down and shut up".

The teacher clicked a button and smiled to himself as he played a funny video of epic fails on Youtube as he set up a special device on his desk. When it was set up he pressed a button which started it and left the room, the device worked. A bright yellow wave of light spread across the room, hitting every boy in the room, making them almost instantly shrink down to 6 inches tall. The teacher came back in and found all the boys naked and knocked out, he picked them up and put them all into a small box and gathered their clothes up and handed them in to the school's reusable clothes bin.

Who's POV do you want to follow?

Jacob : The smart boy who is asked to stay behind to talk and collect his shrunken prize though he doesn't know it

James : The biggest bully in the school, was shrunk in the classroom and is knocked out in the box

Daniel : Jacob's little brother who waits outside Jacob's classroom after school

Keith : The smartest boy in the lowest class, knocked out in Jacob's box

Harry : The weakest member of the tiny class
1.title: Bad day at school

11.content:
Jacob was sitting at the front of the class as he always did, smiling to himself as he knew he had very good grades. He never forgot any equipment and always handed his homework in on time and fully complete. Jacob listened to the teacher all the time and never lost his concentration during class time. Mr Adams came to the front of the class and walked down to Jacob's desk and said "Hey Jacob, i would like you to stay behind after school for a bit, we just need to talk". He sat up straight and proper when he heard this and never thought it was because he had done something naughty, he never did.

He sat through the rest of the class, learning about how to dissect mice and about human anatomy. he was thrilled with these subjects and was giggling with excitement as the hands of the clock ticked down the seconds '5....4....3....2....1....RING' as the bell sounded, heralding the beginning of the summer holidays. Jacob watched as his fellow pupils got out of their seats and filed past him out the door to enjoy their lives.

Mr Adams smiled when the last boy left the room and he closed the door behind him and stood in front of Jacob "Jacob, i have never been prouder of any pupil I have ever taught that i am of you". He grinned as he said it and put his hand on Jacob's head. There was a knock at the door and Mr Adams smiled as he opened it and Mr Fleming came into the room "Afternoon Sir". Jacob exclaimed as he saw her enter the room with a rather large box wrapped in a cloth.

He smiled and left the room and Mr Adams sat on his desk next to the box "Jacob, our school is very overcrowded, with a lot of boys coming from less than savory backgrounds and poor households. Many of these boys have failed the test this year and the Headmaster has decided to give you this as a sign of our thanks for your work this year".

Mr Adams hand grabbed the cloth that covered the box and lifted it away, revealing a small cage, with thin metal bars and to Jacob's amazement, 6 inch tall, naked, blacked out boys on the floor of the cage. "H....how is t...his possible Sir?" he asked as he looked around the cage and saw at least 22 boys inside. "The school decided to save on costs by shrinking the unwanted students, the ones who failed the test and give them to someone who deserved them more, you".

"Thank you Sir, this means a lot". Jacob grinned as he looked in at the boys all blacked out from the shrinking process. "Glad you like them Jacob, put the cage in your bag and head off home, have a great summer, you've earned it". Jacob giggled with excitement as he put the cage inside his backpack and left the classroom and started to head off home.

Who does he met up with outside the school gate?

On a desk- In Jacob's bedroom
12.content:
James was sitting at the back of the classroom, he was the biggest bully in the whole school, spending his time beating up younger, weaker boys for pleasure and money rather than doing homework. His friend Blake sat beside him and they both grinned at each other, they each grabbed a book and threw them at the boys at the front of the class.

Mr Fleming came into the room and watched as the books hit the back of a students head and he started to cry. "That's enough of that James". He boomed at the class as he went over to his desk and put his papers down and stood there. "WE got your test results back in today" shakes his head slowly "To be honest it was pathetic, 6 year olds could do better than this". He threw down a handful of papers in anger.

The rest of the class recoiled a little at this, but James just sat there ignoring everything that was said as Mr Fleming started to read through the results, slowly and at pains to stress how bad the class had done. "Blake, you got 8% of the answers right". Blake felt pretty good, it was the best score of the class. "And finally, James' results, they were by far the worst in the whole country, you got 0% of the answers right in this test". he slammed the paper down on the desk.

James couldn't care less, he was on the football team and had all the skills needed to get a football scholarship so he had no need for stupid test results. Mr Fleming continued with the lesson on human anatomy and how the human body digests it's food for nutrients. James was bored as ever and simply watched the clock hands ticking by, waiting till he could leave this stupid school for the holidays.

Mr Fleming stopped the class not too long before the bell was to ring and locked the door with a smile. There were cries as he did this but he did not care. "Right boys you are all going to be part of something special today, so sit down and shut up". He boomed at the class, and they all sat there in their seats without a sound.
"You boys scored the worst in the school, and the school can't afford the costs of putting such low achievers through another year if they will just fail again. At the beginning of the year your parents signed a contract with the school that if you failed, the school would take ownership of you".

There were mutters of disbelief at hearing this and one boy called out "Does that mean the school owns us now?' he asked kind of scared and Mr Fleming nodded. He set up the screen at the front of the class as the bell rung and they all saw their fellow students flowing out of their classrooms to go to summer holidays. A video of epic fails on Youtube filled the screen and the boys all laughed at the video, while Mr Fleming set up the shrink ray and left the room.

James watched the video and laughed when a man tried to jump over a fence and got caught on it by his foot. There was a sudden beam of light and all the boys blacked out suddenly.

When does James come to?
12.title: James

choices: Jacob, shirtless and his stomach rumbling
Jacob in the kitchen with a frying pan
121.content:
James rolled over in his passed out state an his face landed in a small pool of sweat. This woke him up, he wiped his face with his hands "What the hell was that stuff?' he exclaimed as he stood up and looked at his new surroundings,this wasn't the classroom. Looking around he saw a lot of cold metal bars covered in some sort of white cloth. James tried to calm himself and cried out "Anybody out there, can you hear me?"

He was met with a loud booming voice coming from outside the cage and he recognized it as Mr Adams' voice, he felt a little better and cried out again "Please sir help us". But what he heard wasn't very good. Mr Adams was telling someone outside the cage about what was inside, James gulped and started to shake in fear of what they were talking about out there.

His fears were realized when he saw the shadows of two people through the cloth, one was clearly Mr Adams, the other was a lot smaller, clearly a child of the school., James held his ear to the cloth and heard "Enjoy them Jacob, you've earned them". And then and sudden shape of a hand came over the cloth and it was ripped away, revealing the classroom at a massive size and the grinning face of a young boy.

James recoiled in horror as he looked up at the grinning face of a boy who was slightly younger than him, but was so massive now. The others were starting to come to as well and all screamed out in sheer terror at the sight of Jacob's grinning face. Jacob lifted the cage up and unzipped his gym bag and placed it inside "Hope you like the smell of my gym socks little runts". he laughed as he zipped the bag shut.

That sound haunted the boys in the cage, the sound of the zipper being closed, sealing them inside,as the smell from the boy's gym socks and gym shoes began to flow through the bag and entered every nose in the area. Many boys gagged and coughed as the thick smell stung their eyes and burned their throats, making the trip home a very hellish one for James and his friends.

Then the bag started to move, as the giant boy lifted it up and slung it over his shoulder and walked home, a destination unknown to any of the tiny boys trapped inside the gym bag.

Half an hour later

The bag stopped moving and James breathed a sigh but coughed on the thick, gagging smell from the bag. The sound sent shivers down their spines as the bag opened and light streamed in as the cage was lifted out and they were greeted with a horrible sight............
121.title: In the cage- Under covers

choices: Boys Daniel used to pick on
Boys Daniel had never seen before
13.content:
Daniel was Jacob's 9 year old brother who was in the classroom a few doors down from him. He, like his brother was a very good student and passed the tests with flying colors. Daniel sat at the front of his classroom, as normal but today Mr Blake came up to him and smiled "Hey Daniel could you stay behind for a little bot after school, i just want to have a word with you?' Daniel nodded and smiled to himself.

The class continued as normal, learning about the formation of the planets and why earth has life. The other boys in the class were getting restless as the seconds hand moved very slowly on the clock at the front of the room. Daniel sat there with excitement as the holidays were nearly here. The bell finally rung and the rest of the class stood up from their desks and packed up their gear and left the room.

Mr Blake closed the door behind the last student and smiled down at Daniel at his desk. "You are the best student in this class and by far the best for your age group in this school. The school has an overcrowding problem and we have found a way to do it, but i am asking for your help". Daniel perked up at hearing this "Sure Sir what can i do to help?" The teacher stood up and went over to his desk and took out a small box covered in a cloth

"The school has decided to shrink some boys who have failed the test and we want you to take them home for the holidays and have as much fun as possible with them, make them do whatever you want, eat them, crush them, sell them do whatever you want. When you come back next term i would like you to produce a report on what you did to them and how well it all went".

Daniel was buzzing with excitement at this brand new idea for him and he got to write a report about it too. "I will give you this as extra credit for your end of year results, make me proud Daniel". Pushing the cage over to Daniel, the boy pulled the cloth off and grinned down at the tiny, naked boys in the cage, they were all from the worst class for his age group and the cage contained?
13.title: Daniel

131.content:
Daniel reached over to the cage and pulled the cloth back to reveal the tiny naked boys, all passed out. He grinned with shock as he saw everything single face of the tiny boys, they were all his bullies.They had terrorized him right through his school years, from pushing him over back in 1st grade, right up to stealing his lunch money and beating him up at lunchtime today.

Mr Blake could see the look of shock and the sly grin on Daniel's young face. "Like what you see, they are all yours". Daniel looked up at him and gave him a big hug "Thank you Sir, i'll make good use of these little runts". He giggled as he reached under his desk and pulled out his gym bag and unzipped it and placed the cage of slumbering boys inside next to his sweaty gym socks. He laughed when he zipped the bag back up and stood up and headed out the door.

Jacob was coming out of his classroom with his bag over his shoulder and smiled when he saw Daniel. "Hey little bro, what took you so long?" Daniel blushed a little and whispered "Mr Blake gave me all my bullies shrunk in a cage". Jacob's face recoiled in horror, then he gave a sly grin "My teacher gave me a cage full of boys from the worst class in the school".

Both boys left the school and headed down the short road to their house. "Mr Blake told me to do whatever i wanted with them, and write a report on what i did for extra credit". Daniel said excitedly as Jacob put him arm around his brother's shoulders "I am so proud of you". They reach their house and both boys went up to their bedrooms and locked the doors for their own secret fun with their tiny boys.

Who do you follow?

1311.content:
Daniel ran into the house and straight up the stairs and shut his door behind him, with one quick motion he had locked it too. His room was like any other 9 year olds room, covered in clothes and toys all over the place. On his wall he had all the prizes and awards he had won mostly for science and sport. He smiled to himself as i walked over to his bed and sat down on it, reaching down and lifted his gym bag onto his knees and unzipping it with a giggle.

The cage was sitting right next to his gym socks, they used to be clean white, but now are permanently stained yellow from the sheer amount of sweat that gets trapped in them everyday after gym class. Daniel reached down and grabbed the cage by the bars and lifted it out of the bag with no effort at all, placing it on the desk next to his bed he giggled at how cool this was going to be,

He took out a spare notebook and started to write the first log in his summer project

'Day 1- 3:20pm
Subjects are still passed out on floor of the cage, waiting for them to wake up and realize where they are'

Just as he wrote that the first signs of stirring in the cage were heard. Daniel put his pen down beside the notebook and watched as many of the boys start to come to. Many rubbed their eyes and were blinded by the sharp light from my lights, i giggled at this reaction and all of them looked up at me with a loo of sheer horror.

"OH my God, what happened, why are you so big?" Trevor, the leader of the bullies cried up at Daniel. The boy replied with a shrug "I am not big, your just small, shrunk by the school as a gift to me". The boys were all terrified by the idea of being tiny and naked in front of me, some had pissed themselves already, while others were banging on the cage bars trying to escape

Daniel glared down at the boys in the cage and boomed.......

Daniel stood up and shed his school uniform and sat back down on his bed.
Daniel then reached in the cage and randomly pulled out one of the six inch boys and looked him over before locking the cage again and sat the cage with the rest of the boys at the foot of his bed, where they could watch what was unfolding in front of them, knowing that something like what they witness here, was probably going to be their own dilemma as well .

Daniel pulls out a bad boy that he did not recognize, it seems that there was more of these kind of mean boys at his school then he would have guessed.
Daniel dangles the boy in front of his face and asked him " Now I know that I do not know you but I will give you a choice, you can either play with me inside of my underwear or you can be given to my pet dog for his dinner tonight" .. the young unknown boy screams out " okay, okay, I will play with you really really good, anywhere you want. Just don't kill me ".

info.brief_description: The smartest student in the school is given the worst students, what happens to them?
info.description:
In the small township of Harrison, they had a single massive all boys school, combining elementary, middle and high school all into one. This proved the school with a problem of over crowding and subsequent bad grades. The school board created a system where the boy who performed the best in the school exams and was overall the best student, would be given a special prize at the end of the year.

They choose to eliminate the weak links in the school by finding the worst performing class, the ones with the worst grades and make them the prize. It was decided the worst class would be shrunk to become the best prize for the best student.

NO girls
No adults (Except for the teachers in chapter one)
any and all boy related fetishes are allowed
